text: jab chal rahee thee teree bahan[1], phir kah rahee theeh kya main tumhen use bata doon, jo isaka laalan-paalan kare? phir hamane punah tumhen pahuncha diya tumhaaree maan ke paas, taaki usakee aankh thandee ho aur udaaseen na ho tatha he moosa! toone maar diya ek vyakti ko, to hamane tujhe mukt kar diya chinta[2] se aur hamane teree bhalee-bhaanti pareeksha lee. phir too rah gaya varshon madyan ke logon mein, phir too (madyan se) apane nishchit samay par aa gaya
